titleStmt.title: A disquisition upon our Saviour's sanction of tithes, Matth. 23, 23 and Luke 11, 42 wherein that whole case is most impartially stated and resolved according to express scripture for the satisfaction of all scruples.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
